title: This Discord Server with over 5000 people can hook you up with any duo/team!

embed.description: Step up your game with a modern voice & text chat app. Crystal clear voice, multiple server and channel support, mobile apps, and more. Get your free server now!

body:
If you're:

1.  Looking for a duo for ranked
2.  Looking for a premade team for flex
3.  Just looking for new friends to play with

Then this server has pretty much got you covered. It's been the biggest OCE only discord server for league of legends for over a year.
As well as being able to find people to play with, the server offers an outstanding amount of features for members:

1.  Give a screenshot based on your current league rank to gain a role based on your rank, giving you access to a chat dedicated to those of your rank (eg: Diamond Chat)
2.  Give a screenshot of a champion over 100K mastery to gain a role based on that champion
3.  Use the #faction chat to type a command to obtain a role based on a faction (eg: Demacia, Noxus)
4.  Voice channels - The server offers over 25 voice channels for you and your friends to join. They have room limits (eg: Duo, Trio, 4-Man, 5-Man) so people don't join if it's full
5.  Clubs - The discord has an official in-game club for the discord server
6.  Contests & Tournaments
7. Giveaways - The server holds a weekly discord giveaway & Holds 5 Twitter giveaways a week on their Twitter.

**Their Twitter -**

https://twitter.com/LoLOceDiscord

**Their Discord - COME JOIN!**

https://discord.gg/HsfgbMX

http://i67.tinypic.com/2pyyhjc.jpg[/IMG]
